mdd

Class Layer

  • java.lang.Object
    • mdd.Layer

  • public class Layer
extends Object
    Represents a layer of the MDD.
    Author:
    Vianney Copp√©

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int number 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Layer(Problem problem, MDD mdd, int number)
      Returns an empty layer of the problem.
      Layer(Problem problem, MDD mdd, Node node, int number)
      Returns a layer containing the given node.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addNode(Node node)
      Adds nodes to the layer or updates an existing node in the layer with the same State.
      Node best()
      Returns the best node of the layer, the one with maximum longest-path value.
      boolean isExact()
      Returns a boolean telling if the layer is equal to the corresponding complete MDD layer.
      boolean isFinal()
      Returns a boolean telling if the layer is the last one i. e. all the variables are assigned.
      Layer nextLayer(int width, boolean relaxed)
      Returns the next layer of the MDD using the variableSelector to choose the next variable to assign and the problem implementation to provide the successors of all the nodes of the layer.
      Collection<Node> nodes()
      Returns a Set of all nodes contained in the layer.
      void removeNodes(Node[] nodes)
      Remove the nodes from the layer.
      void removeNodes(Node[] nodes, Set<Node> frontier)
      Remove the nodes from the layer.
      void reset(int number)
      Clears the content of the layer in order to reuse the object.
      int width()
      Returns the width of the layer.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • number

        public int number

    • Constructor Detail

      • Layer

        public Layer(Problem problem,
             MDD mdd,
             int number)
        Returns an empty layer of the problem.
        Parameters:
        problem - the implementation of a problem
        mdd - the associated decision diagram
        number - the number of the layer

      • Layer

        public Layer(Problem problem,
             MDD mdd,
             Node node,
             int number)
        Returns a layer containing the given node.
        Parameters:
        problem - the implementation of a problem
        mdd - the associated decision diagram
        node - the node to be contained
        number - the number of the layer

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset(int number)
        Clears the content of the layer in order to reuse the object.
        Parameters:
        number - the number of the layer

      • nextLayer

        public Layer nextLayer(int width,
                       boolean relaxed)
        Returns the next layer of the MDD using the variableSelector to choose the next variable to assign and the problem implementation to provide the successors of all the nodes of the layer.
        Parameters:
        width - the maximum width of the relaxed/restricted decision diagram
        relaxed - true for a relaxed decision diagram and false for a restricted one
        Returns:
        the next layer of the MDD

      • addNode

        public void addNode(Node node)
        Adds nodes to the layer or updates an existing node in the layer with the same State.
        Parameters:
        node - the node to be added

      • removeNodes

        public void removeNodes(Node[] nodes)
        Remove the nodes from the layer.
        Parameters:
        nodes - the nodes to be removed

      • removeNodes

        public void removeNodes(Node[] nodes,
                        Set<Node> frontier)
        Remove the nodes from the layer.
        Parameters:
        nodes - the nodes to be removed
        frontier - the frontier cutset in order to add exact parents

      • nodes

        public Collection<Node> nodes()
        Returns a Set of all nodes contained in the layer.
        Returns:
        a Set with all the nodes

      • width

        public int width()
        Returns the width of the layer.
        Returns:
        the number of nodes in the layer

      • best

        public Node best()
        Returns the best node of the layer, the one with maximum longest-path value.
        Returns:
        a Node object representing the best node of the layer

      • isExact

        public boolean isExact()
        Returns a boolean telling if the layer is equal to the corresponding complete MDD layer.
        Returns:
        true iff the layer is equal to the corresponding complete MDD layer

      • isFinal

        public boolean isFinal()
        Returns a boolean telling if the layer is the last one i. e. all the variables are assigned.
        Returns:
        true iff the layer is the final one
